bibl.title: Notes for a Sermon on the Cross (PMich. Inv. 1628): A Source for Alexander Monachus, De inventione sanctae crucis ?
Atti del XVII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. II
bibl.author: Priest, Nancy E.

bibl.note: No indication of provenance, fourth century A.D. or perhaps a bit later.
bibl.seg: Priest Nancy E., Notes for a Sermon on the Cross (PMich. Inv. 1628): A Source for Alexander Monachus, De inventione sanctae crucis (MG 83 III 4073)?
Atti del XVII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. II (Napoli, 1984) pp. 374-375.
